results.content: I have completed the courses. I am a beginner in the web world and about to build my first website and this course has solved all my doubt about WordPress web building and hosting. My only suggestion is to add some lectures or worksheet that provide some best plugins and themes considering a vast experience of an instructor. (I mean resource sheet) This will help beginner like me to get all thing in one place. Instructor is explaining everything very clearly.

results.content:
The other courses I reviewed had issues with quality of production (visual setting and sound problems), didn't follow a systematic syllabus, or they fluctuated on the learning level of the student they were addressing.  Some were too "sales-like" versus an actual how-to course.  Overall, I felt like I would be wasting my time.  

"Michael" is "right there."  He's not telling me how amazing he is or what he can sell me.  He's comfortable and sticks to the educational aspect of the course description.  He moves through the material with confidence and a touch of practical humor.  

Love the click sounds at the beginning and end of each section.  LOVE that there is no music!!!  I've taken a similar, no-nonsense wordpress video tutorial for free before, sponsored by one of the wordpress engineers, but couldn't find it this time around.   This course is truly a step by step build your own site manual.  Michael instructs you to pause the video and go do this or that, then come back and resume the lesson.

The quick, periodic quizzes help confirm that you are retaining the information.  If you get a question wrong, a link pops up to take you to the lesson where that material was covered.  

There is quick and personal support if you do not understand something.  

Michael's course is worth the time and money.  You will be well prepared and excited to get started.

"Michael" is "right there." He's not telling me how amazing he is or what he can sell me. He's comfortable and sticks to the educational aspect of the course description. He moves through the material with confidence and a touch of practical humor.

Love the click sounds at the beginning and end of each section. LOVE that there is no music!!! Michael's course is worth the time and money. You will be well prepared and excited to get started.

results.content: It's a good course. It has demystified how to make a web site. It also clearly explains what everything is and why its there.

results.content: I took it to learn Word Press for a domain I already purchased.  I feel like they are trying to sell me something I don't need or make me feel guilty that I already purchased a website domain.  I want the time spent learning Word Press.  They have not even taken me to word press yet.
